pkgmetadata.longdescription: # tg-react![https://badge.fury.io/py/tg-react](https://badge.fury.io/py/tg-react.png)![Workflow status](https://github.com/thorgate/tg-react/actions/workflows/python-package.yml/badge.svg?branch=master)Helpers for react based applications running on django.## DocumentationThe full documentation is at https://tg-react.readthedocs.org.## QuickstartInstall tg-react:```pip install tg-react```Then use it in a project:```import tg_react```## Features* TODO..
